data.name: Configure Elastic
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="timer://{{source}}?repeatCount=1"/>
    <setHeader name="ES_NAME">
        <constant>
            {{ES_NAME}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="ES_URL">
        <constant>
            {{ES_URL}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="ES_USER">
        <constant>
            {{ES_USER}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="ES_PASS">
        <constant>
            {{ES_PASS}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <process ref="elasticConfigSetter"/>
</route>
